column2:
"I have put you through much trouble.
I feel as though I've seen
the perfection of your photon magic."

"First-rate ARKS operatives each have their own
style, and you have definitely joined their ranks."

"Still, I'll be expecting bigger and better things from
you in the days to come."

"ご苦労だった。
君らしいテクニックの完成を
見た思いがするよ。"

"一流のアークスというのは皆
それぞれの型を持っているものだ。
君もその域に達したということだ。"
"今後も大いに発展させてくれたまえ。"
